title: Gluten-Free Peppermint Brownies
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 F and grease or line an 8 x 8 baking pan with parchment.
In a medium saucepan, add the butter to melt.
Stir in Better Brownies Mix, heating over low, to melt all chocolate pieces.
Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Remove from heat, stir in the peppermint.
Crush peppermint pieces and sprinkle over the top.
Transfer to oven and bake 23-25 minutes, or just until edges of brownies begin to pull away.
Remove from oven and cool on a wire rack or in an ice bath.
ingredients: 6 Tbsp. grass-fed butter or coconut oil
2 candy canes. (TruJoy Organic Candy Canes or Dr. John’s Candy Canes)
